name: Alex! ‚ù§Ô∏è
greetingText: It's 19th of April... what a special date, isn't it?
wishText: Keep shining and flying like you do, even the sky is not the limit for you!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you beautiful Alex!! I wish you the best...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text3: But then I thought... that maybe...
outroText: Enjoy every single moment of this year that's coming, you deserve it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
